summary: PURCHASED CAR 5/2000 WITH 10,000 MILES.  OIL LEAK ON GARAGE FLOOR, TOOK TO MECHANIC WHO SAID CAR HAD BLOWN HEAD GASKET & THESE CARS ARE NOTORIOUS FOR THIS PROBLEM.  DEALER CONTACTED, WHO REFUSED TO REPAIR UNDER WARRANTY EVEN THOUGH IT IS ONLY 1 MONTH PAST THE 3 YR DATE & WELL UNDER THE 36,000 MILES.  THINK MFG. SHOULD BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR QUALITY ISSUE.  FOUND SEVERAL REPORTS OF SAME PROBLEM ON YOUR WEBSITE.  NEED HELP. SINGLE PARENT & NO MONEY TO REPAIR AT MY EXPENSE.  MR  **** DIMS II IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/2002 CUT-OVER ARTEMIS****740626
